main event: Four soldiers from the 10th Armor reported an unidentified flying object on November 5, 1957.
interesting points: The radar detected an object at 30,000 feet traveling rapidly before disappearing from the radar within 11 minutes., The sighting involved multiple personnel, indicating a coordinated observation., The objectâ€™s characteristics were described variably, ranging from the size of a 25-gallon drum to that of an egg., A bright light was noted that resembled a bulb with a glowing effect during the observation., Weather conditions were cloudy with little wind during the sighting.
sighted object: unidentified flying object and bright light
